---
title: "Preliminary survdat reports"
author: "Abigail Tyrell"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %b %Y')`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

`%>%` <- dplyr::`%>%`

all_pages <- list.files(here::here("docs/"), pattern = ".html")
all_pages <- all_pages[-which(all_pages == "index.html")]
survdat_pages <- all_pages[which(nchar(all_pages) == 8)]
assessmentdata_pages <- all_pages[-which(nchar(all_pages) == 8)]
```

# Table of contents
## `survdat`
These reports are a preliminary analysis of `survdat` data.

```{r}
purrr::map(survdat_pages, ~paste("<a href='https://rtabandera.github.io/esp_data_aggregation/", .x, "'>",
                 .x, "</a>", sep = "")) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = "SVSPP")

```

## `assessmentdata`
These reports are a preliminary analysis of `assessmentdata` data.

```{r}
purrr::map(assessmentdata_pages, ~paste("<a href='https://rtabandera.github.io/esp_data_aggregation/", .x, "'>",
                 .x, "</a>", sep = "")) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = "Stock Name")

```
